section2.text1: Nopparat Thara Beach - Phi Phi Islands National Park
section2.text2: Conservation Area Administration Office 5 (Nakhon Si Thammarat)
section2.text3: Department of National Parks,  Wildlife and Plant Conservation
section2.text4: Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment

history.text1: Nopparat Thara Beach National Park - Phi Phi Islands was declared a national park in the Royal Government Gazette, Volume 100, Section 106, dated October 6, 1983, and is Thailand's 47th National Park, , located at 47P477856E 889518N, with an area of approximately 387.90 square kilometers or 242,437 rai, with approximately 80 percent ground area and 20 percent water area.

organizationStructure.title: Senior forestry officer, head of the national park

position.2: National Parks Education and Research Department
